title: WTB - T206 Waddell Portrait Old Mill

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Waddell Portrait Old Mill
posts.post_content: Good god this is my 27th WTB post for this card.  Can anyone help?  Even if only to make me stop asking!?!  😂

posts.post_title: Here's an Old Mill Rube Waddell
posts.post_content:
Can't say nobody found you one.

[url]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1909-11-t206-old-mill-rube-waddell-portrait-psa-nm-mt-8-pop-two-none-higher-for-brand/a/50018-50495.s[/url]
Hahaha!  Yes, I’m aware of THAT one.  But thx.
